title: Levi's Women's New Boyfriend Jeans (Also Available in Plus)
description: Relaxed fit through hip and thigh
Front Rise: 9inch; Back Rise: 13 7/8inch; Leg Opening: 13inch

The Levi's Plus Boyfriend jeans are the hottest on-trend cut for the hottest look around! Mid-rise boyfriend jeans flaunt a straight leg, and easy fit through the waist and seat. Roll or unroll cuffs as you see fit. Super soft fabric with stretch and recovery to ensure the jeans keep their shape all day. Classic five-pocket design with signature arcuate stitch. Leather brand patch at the back waist. Woven flag patch set at the back right pocket. Belt loop waistband. Zipper fly and button closure. 79% cotton, 19% polyester, 2% elastane;White: 97% cotton, 3% elastane. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
